name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stoner Rock World Wide Album Player

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A full album player for all albums published on STONER ROCK WORLD WIDE (SRWW) incl. play controls.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple full album player for all albums published on STONER ROCK WORLD WIDE (SRWW). SRWW is a social media site & network which is everything about heavy rock. The Chrome extension allows you to keep all the music you love close to you and to play it even without having the website or mobile App opened.
